conversations.body_text: Hi Joel Slaughter,  Your item has arrived in the USA and is being processed by the warehouse. Tomorrow Fedex will do the pickup. We are sorry for the delay caused to you, due to the tariffs, there will be some delay in the logistics time, we will refund the extra shipping fee for you, thank you for your understanding. Sincere apologies!

Sounds good thanks
